verses.roman:
sei gāḍe karena prabhu pāda-prakṣālane
tabe karibāre yāya īśvara-daraśane

synonyms: sei gāḍe—in that ditch; karena—does; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; pāda-prakṣālane—washing the feet; tabe—thereafter; karibāre—to do; yāya—He goes; īśvara-daraśane—to visit Lord Jagannātha.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu would wash His feet in this ditch, and then He would enter the temple to see Lord Jagannātha.
